#summary SSA4J Annotation Reference
#labels Featured

|| *Annotation* || *Description* ||
|| [SSA4JAnnotation_ScrapeSession @ScrapeSession] || Top level annotation for any Class that will bind to a scrape session. ||
|| [SSA4JAnnotation_ScrapeSessionErrors @ScrapeSessionErrors] || Maps session variables as error messages scraped from the page. ||
|| [SSA4JAnnotation_ScrapeSessionCookies @ScrapeSessionCookies] || Saves a given list of session variables as persistent values that are automatically saved in a "cookie-jar" and reflected back as session variables in future calls.||
|| [SSA4JAnnotation_ScrapeSesssionVariable @ScrapeSesssionVariable] || Define a binding with a session variable.  ||
